video_prompt: Fluid, reflective teardrop forms ripple and connect, revealing shifting inclusions within: a sailing ship navigates, a multi-petal flower blooms, and diamond-faceted cubes rotate. Background patterns subtly morph, while a vibrant logo pulses into view.
image_prompt: Abstract digital art wallpaper featuring glossy, reflective silver/blue-grey teardrop shapes arranged vertically. These fluid forms contain detailed inclusions: a checkerboard cube, a sailing ship on calm water with a pink/blue sky, silver multi-petal flowers, faceted diamond cubes, and a metallic grid cube. The background displays golden floral and baroque patterns, transitioning to dark gradients. The composition is highly detailed and luminous, with intense light glares and starburst reflections. A "c29" rainbow logo is in the bottom right corner.
refined_video_prompt: Reflective teardrops fluidly ripple, connecting and constantly reforming. Within their shifting depths, a sailing ship navigates, a multi-petal flower blooms, and diamond cubes endlessly rotate. Background patterns subtly morph as a vibrant logo pulses and fades.
